options.name: Enable Reverse Proxy
options.description: Enable or disable the reverse proxy functionality.

options.name: Proxy Routes
options.description: Proxy route configuration in JSON format (e.g., [{"path": "/api", "target": "http://localhost:3000"}])

options.name: Timeout for Upstream Request
options.description: Maximum time (in milliseconds) to wait for a response from the proxied backend server before timing out. Default is 30000ms (30 seconds)

options.name: Enable Basic Authentication
options.description: Enable or disable Basic Authentication for proxied routes.

options.name: Basic Auth Users (JSON)
options.description: Users and passwords for Basic Auth in JSON format (e.g., {"myuser":"mypassword", "admin":"secret"}). IMPORTANT: Passwords are in plaintext for this example.

options.name: Max Connections (per window)
options.description: Maximum number of connections allowed from a single IP address within the specified time window. Set to 0 to disable.

options.name: Rate Limit Time Window (minutes)
options.description: Time window in minutes for rate limiting. Connections are counted within this period. Set to 0 to disable.

options.name: Use X-Forwarded-For for Client IP
options.description: Enable if your server is behind another proxy (e.g., Cloudflare, Nginx) to get the real client IP.
